TEXT.TITLE: ODYSSEY FILMPARTNERS <ODYY> DROPS MERGER TALKS
TEXT.BODY: Odyssey Filmpartners Ltd said is terminated discussions to acquire <United Color Labs>, pursuant to a Jan 27 letter of intent for it to buy the company for stock and cash. Reuter
